tool.name: Constrained conformer generation
tool.command: ln -s $refmol ./refmol.sdf && python -m pipelines.rdkit.constrained_conf_gen -i '$infile' -if sdf -r './refmol.sdf' #if $core_smi -c '$core_smi' #end if -n $number --refmolidx $refmolidx --meta -o outp -of sdf &>> $logfile && cat outp_metrics.txt &>> $logfile && gzip -dc outp.sdf.gz &>> outp.sdf || :

param.name: refmolidx
param.label: Reference molecule index
param.help: Index of the reference molecule index in the file, if not the first

param.name: number
param.label: Number of conformers
param.help: Number of conformers to generate, if None then input structures are assumed to already be 3D')

param.name: core_smi
param.label: Core substructure
param.help: If not specified - guessed using MCS

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
This tool generates constrained conformers for a set of input molecules, using the chemistry toolkit RDKit.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
| - Molecules in `SDF format`_ | - Reference molecule in SDF format.
.. _SDF format: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_table_file
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
SD-file containing generated conformers.
